It’s difficult to tell the difference between these joggers and a very expensive pair of joggers in my closet. These wash up like new every time,  retain their shape, and dry quickly. They can be worn for a workout or for dining out when paired with the right shoes.

These joggers are dressier than the sweatshirt material. However, if you are wider in the middle, even a little, these are not the ones to get. I usually wear a large/extra large. I use these as work Scrub pants. They look like Scrub pants, super comfortable,  flattering, and move with my body. The ONLY thing I'd change is get rid of the high waist. Unfortunately was under impression they would be more jogger style pants but when arrived they were silky polyester style material not worth $5

These "Slim Fit Luxurious Jogger Pants" are a slim, high-wasted fit and feel so luxurious! I am 5'2" and weigh 115 pounds; the pants are a perfect fit. They are not baggy at all and could actually pass as more than a casual pant. They have four pockets - two are zippered. I chose the brown color because it is on trend, but there are 19 other colors to choose from. These jogger pants are a definite reorder in another color for me.

These are my all time favorite joggers! I have them in multiple colors cause they’re so great. Super comfortable, especially to workout in! And they’re cute too! Not too thick or thin in material, just perfect! - they definitely run big though so size down! I’m usually a small or medium and these are an XS - only annoying thing is the strings have like a metal piece on the ends that constantly bang together when you walk lmaooo so I just tuck the strings in cause they’re worth it!
The white version is completely see-through. The fabric is thin and transparent.
Got these and legitimately loved them so much I got 6 different pairs in different colors. Absolute comfortable, functional, flattering, and well made.  Can’t recommend enough
Very comfy

评论详情: I ordered these in black and the fit is amazing! I usually wear a large/XL and ordered XL and they fit great! Not too baggy and a great tapered leg. The material is amazing. I did order the fleece lined G Gradual and did not care for them as much - the fight is a bit tighter and they seemed very warm. These are great pants and will order again!
These are great, good quality.  The wide waste band is very comfortable.  I ordered a second pair I liked them so much.  Wear them for yoga too.
Great product and fit.
Great sleek material. A little bulky on top but great for casual athlesure style.

I liked the fit and the styling. Perfect for around town, and lounging.

My wife has other pairs of these pants and loves them.  The newest pair she got, the stitching is already ripping on the waist after only one wash, seems to be a quality defect from fabrication.

I absolutely love these joggers! So many great features - hidden pockets, stretchy and "forgiving" fabric, super soft and comfortable. They will be perfect for running around town, walking or working out, lounging around the house, and traveling. I'm obsessed and now have these in five colors! For context, I'm 5'3 153# and bought the Large. Waist is perfect and legs/butt are slightly loose but not baggy.

I'm 5' tall and 120 pounds. These are a perfect fit! The fabric is on the shiny side, making them sleek, but I love the look.  I first bought a black pair using a coupon code, then went back and paid full price for the blue pair because I loved them so much. Highly recommend!

They are too loose around the waist since I bought a size up but not too tight around the legs. Not great and would’ve returned if I didn’t miss the window but they are comfortable.

I bought these, had to send them back and size up. I still think they are too tight in the waist. The fabric is very smooth and stretchy. The waistband is made of a different fabric. They are thin and light. If you are heavier in the tummy like me, size up for sure.
Very comfortable. Thicker than another brand which I purchased at the same time. These also have the two zippered pockets, which are much appreciated.
So comfy ,great material ,fits perfect

Ordered these pants on a whim for a trip. They fit perfectly and are amazingly comfortable!! I ended up buying another pair and will buy more and other colors in the near future! I have both the black and khaki color, very comfortable and stretchy!

Incredibly soft and comfortable. I bought 2 more in different colors. Nice pocket size. Fits really well. A friend saw me wear these pants and bought a couple pairs for herself. I’ve worn and washed multiple times and still look like new. Highly recommend

These are advertised as sweatpants. I expected them to be made of typical sweatpant/sweatshirt material - in part because so many reviewers said they were cozy. NO they are NOT sweatpants. They are joggers. MUCH thinner material. Will not provide the kind of warmth for winter that I am looking for.  They seem to be made well and fabric and style is nice - IF you're looking for joggers - NOT sweatpants.  I am returning them.
Exactly as described. Soft fabric. Very comfortable to wear. Will buy again.
